title:
'Soul Surfer's Bethany Hamilton on Trusting God and Overcoming Life's Obstacles (Video)

On October ...

attachments.displayName:
'Soul Surfer's Bethany Hamilton on Trusting God and Overcoming Life's Obstacles (Video)

On October 16, pro-surfer Hamilton, who lost her left arm to a shark-attack ten years ago, spoke to thousands of students at Liberty University's convocation, where she explained how her world were turned upside down after the shark-attack, because she may never be able to do what she loves the most - surfing and loving God passionately...http://ow.ly/qs0Vi

'Soul Surfer's Bethany Hamilton on Trusting God and Overcoming Life's Obstacles (Video)

On October 16, pro-surfer Hamilton, who lost her left arm to a shark-attack ten years ago, spoke to thousands of students at Liberty University's convocation, where she explained how her world were turned upside down after the shark-attack, because she may never be able to do what she loves the most - surfing and loving God passionately...http://ow.ly/qs0Vi
